00001 import wx
00002 import wx.lib.stattext
00003 
00004 class IndividualPanel(wx.Panel):
00005 
00006     def __init__(self, parent, id, widget_style, grid, ui_data, size = None):
00007         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent = parent, size = (300,200), style = wx.SIMPLE_BORDER)
00008 
00009         self.parent = parent
00010         self.id = id
00011 
00012         gridSize = [10,2]
00013         
00014         widgets = {}
00015         widgets['label'] = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText
00016         widgets['slider'] = wx.Slider
00017         widgets['button'] = wx.Button
00018         widgets['textbox'] = wx.TextCtrl
00019         widgets['combobox'] = wx.Choice
00020         self.widgets = widgets
00021 
00022         #self.SetBackgroundColour(tuple(widget_style[0]))
00023         self.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[0])
00024 
00025         sizer = wx.GridSizer(gridSize[0], gridSize[1], 2, 2)
00026 
00027         wIndex = 1
00028         for j in xrange(gridSize[0]):
00029             for k in xrange(gridSize[1]):
00030                 if grid[j*gridSize[1] + k] > 0:
00031                     _widget = self.addWidget(ui_data[grid[j*gridSize[1]+k]])
00032                     # set bg color
00033                     _widget.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[wIndex])
00034                     wIndex += 1
00035                     sizer.Add(_widget, 1, border = 5, flag=wx.EXPAND)
00036 
00037                 else:
00038                     sizer.Add((20, 5))
00039 
00040 
00041         sizer.Layout()
00042 
00043         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00044         self.bestLabel = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText(self, -1, "Best:")
00045         self.worstLabel = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText(self, -1, "Worst:")
00046 
00047         self.bestLabel.SetFont(wx.Font(11, wx.NORMAL, wx.NORMAL, wx.BOLD))
00048         self.worstLabel.SetFont(wx.Font(11, wx.NORMAL, wx.NORMAL, wx.BOLD))
00049         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00050         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00051 
00052         self.sizer.Add(self.bestLabel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00053         self.sizer.Add(self.worstLabel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00054         self.sizer.Add(sizer)
00055 
00056         self.Layout()
00057 
00058 
00059         #self.sizer.Fit(self);
00060         #self.sizer.SetSizeHints(self)
00061         self.SetSizer(self.sizer)
00062 
00063         feedback_option = self.parent.feedback_option
00064         feedback_sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.HORIZONTAL)
00065         for option in feedback_option:
00066             button = wx.Button(self, -1, option)
00067             feedback_sizer.Add(button)
00068             self.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.onFeedback, button)
00069 
00070         self.sizer.Add(feedback_sizer)
00071 
00072 
00073 #------------------------------------------#
00074     def onFeedback(self, event):
00075         '''
00076         Tell parent that I've been selected.
00077         Let my parent keep track of whose been selected for what.
00078         '''
00079         button = event.GetEventObject()
00080         self.parent.onFeedback(button, self)
00081 
00082 #------------------------------------------#
00083     def unSelect(self):
00084         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00085         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00086 
00087 #------------------------------------------#
00088     def bestSelect(self, event):
00089         self.bestLabel.Show()
00090         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00091         self.Layout()
00092         self.parent.onBestSelect(self.id)
00093 
00094 #------------------------------------------#
00095     def worstSelect(self, event):
00096         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00097         self.worstLabel.Show()
00098         self.Layout()
00099         self.parent.onWorstSelect(self.id)
00100 
00101 
00102 #------------------------------------------#
00103     def addWidget(self, widget):
00104         _widget = None
00105         if widget['name'] == 'label':
00106             _widget = self.widgets['label'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00107 
00108         elif widget['name'] == 'textbox':
00109             _widget = self.widgets['textbox'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00110 
00111         elif widget['name'] == 'button':
00112             _widget = self.widgets['button'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00113 
00114         elif widget['name'] == 'slider':
00115             _widget = self.widgets['slider'](self, -1, size = widget['size'])
00116 
00117         elif widget['name'] == 'combobox':
00118             _widget = self.widgets['combobox'](self, -1, size = widget['size'], 
00119                     choices = eval(widget['value']))
00120 
00121         return _widget
00122
